radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild subpleural interlobular septal thickening without lobar consolidation or evidence of acute pulmonary embolism.
Borderline enlargement of the spleen (13.3 cm in length), right kidney (12.3 cm), left kidney (12.4 cm), and markedly echogenic renal parenchyma bilaterally.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Patchy atelectasis of the lung bases, mild left paraaortic retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy, persistent bilateral enhancement of the kidneys, and trace free fluid in the pelvis.
